issue.title: Transform from X2_1/base_link/imu_sensor to X2_1/base_link is unavailable

content.raw: There is an odometry topic already published, are you pursuing a Z-position component to feed into your mapping algorithm/for localization at this level or do you just not want to use the odometry topic?  Either way, you can configure the robot\_localization package to work around in the current tf tree structure.
content.html: There is an odometry topic already published, are you pursuing a Z-position component to feed into your mapping algorithm/for localization at this level or do you just not want to use the odometry topic? Either way, you can configure the robot_localization package to work around in the current tf tree structure.
